original_text: And it was so, that when the children of Ammon made war against Israel, the elders of Gilead went to fetch Jephthah out of the land of Tob:
korean_text: 암몬 자손이 이스라엘을 치려 할 때에 길르앗 장로들이 입다를 데려오려고 돕 땅에 가서

sentences.original_text: when the children of Ammon made war against Israel
the elders of Gilead went to fetch Jephthah
out of the land of Tob:
